mdRecord.dcterms:title: Le grand triumphe magnificque & resiouissance des Parisiens, de la venue du treschrestien Roy Henry second de ce nom en sa ville de Paris / par F. debez. Auec vne epistre a la Royne
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bez, Ferrand de, d. 1581 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: [16] p., [1] leaf of plates : port. ; 14 cm. (8vo)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Trautz-Bauzonnet. Monogram bookplate of "AA." Handwritten note identifies AA as Alphonse Accdeust (?) and lists other owners, J.L.A. Coste and Fairfax Murray. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 163. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Henry, II, King of France, 1519-1559
France--History--Henry II, 1547-1559
